ValidationRule.description: If the account record type is Vendor or Competitor, the Industry Type is not required
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND (
NOT ( OR ( ISPICKVAL(Record_Type__c, "Vendor"), ISPICKVAL(Record_Type__c, "Competitor") ) ),
ISBLANK(TEXT(Industry_Type__c)) ) && $Setup.rh2__PS_Settings__c.rh2__Run_Validation_Rule__c && $Profile.Name != 'System Administrator'
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Industry Type is a required field on Account records. Please add the appropriate Industry Type to the Account record in order to proceed
